articles.content: Victor Oladipo had the support of a family that didn’t quite understand how or why the son of Nigerian immigrants would fall so hard — at age 4, no less — for basketball. But they were there for him, packing him into the car each morning, for Oladipo’s father… [+673 chars]

articles.content: In 2018, the Browns were armed with a very rare assortment of premium draft capital: the No. 1 and No. 4 overall picks. Ultimately, of course, they used those picks on quarterback Baker Mayfield and cornerback Denzel Ward, but they were reportedly involved in… [+2792 chars]

articles.title: ATP Extends Tour Suspension - ATP Tour
articles.description: The ATP has extended the suspension of the ATP Tour through to July 31, 2020 due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.
articles.content:
The ATP has extended the suspension of the ATP Tour through to July 31, 2020 due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.
The decision, made in close collaboration with Tour members, means ATP events in Hamburg, Bastad, Newport, Los Cabos, Gstaad, Umag, Atlanta and… [+967 chars]

articles.title: MLB rumors: Ex-Mets manager Art Howe in ICU battling coronavirus - NJ.com
articles.description: Art Howe managed the New York Mets from 2003-2004. He also managed the Houston Astros (1989-1993) and Oakland A's (1996-2002).
articles.content:
Art Howe is in a fight for his life.
The former Mets manager is in the hospital and in ICU due to a battle with coronavirus.
Howe talked to KCRP2 in Houston about the battle and the symptoms hes experienced along the way.

articles.title: Golf returns to Xbox One with PGA Tour 2K21 launching this August - TrueAchievements
articles.description: 2K has announced a new golf game coming to Xbox One this August. PGA TOUR 2K21 features 15 licensed PGA Tour courses, 12 PGA Tour professionals and allows players to create their own custom courses.
articles.content: 2K has announced a new golf simulation game coming to Xbox One this August. PGA Tour 2K21 is developed by HB Studios and features 15 licensed PGA Tour courses that have been scanned and re-created using high-end tech to ensure fairways, greens, bunkers, trees… [+2249 chars]
